job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAn employer is seeking a Senior Net DeveloperApplication Architect to join their Application Development Services department on site in Middletown CTampnbspYou will be part of a team of developers tasked with supporting the agencies custom software applicationsampnbspThe position entails supporting legacy ASPNet applications upgrading existing applications to the latest technology and general maintenance of existing applications and everything in betweenltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt Architectural design for all application development projects ltpgtltpgt Responsible for making sure all technology conforms to State of CT and HIPAA standards ltpgtltpgt Data modeling ltpgtltpgt Development Leadampnbspltpgt
